snippet: State Senator Daniel L. Squadron is a former aide to Senator Charles E. Schumer, who is making a rare appearance in a television commercial backing him.
abstract: Trailside blog; Sen Charles E Schumer is throwing his political weight behind protege  State Senator Daniel L Squadron, in battle for public advocate of New York City.
lead_paragraph: State Senator Daniel L. Squadron is a former aide to Senator Charles E. Schumer, who is making a rare appearance in a television commercial backing him.

headline.main: Schumer Endorses Candidate for Public Advocate
headline.print_headline: Schumer Endorses Candidate for Public Advocate
